page.title: 03RN VICTUALLING DEPOT (cont)
page.content: the cost is about Â£11,000,000. There are 160 workers,all civilians,at the Depot,who each have 3 to 4 different jobs a day.Each day a worker is expected to pack 350 drinks and sundries packets.In a year this amounts to 4,000,000 packs.The workers are on a bonus scheme,the more they pack,the more they earn.80%of the workers are women. The main function of the Depot is to supply ration packs to the forces in times of war.It also supplies ordinary food in peace time.There are different ration packs for different circumstances;a 24 hour general service ration pack;a 24 hour Artic pack;a 4 man pack and10 man pack.these work for either 10 or 4 men for 1 day or one man for 10 or 4 days. At the Depot.there is a small laboratory to check that the food being sent out is in good condition.
